tool_description: Creates smooth crossfades between two audio tracks with customizable fade curves and timing for seamless transitions.

fade_curve.description: Fade curve type (linear, exponential, logarithmic, s_curve)

overlap_start.description: Start time of crossfade in track_a (from end if not specified)

error_messages: Invalid track IDs: Both track_a_id and track_b_id must exist.
Invalid crossfade duration: Duration must be between 0.1 and 30 seconds.
Unsupported fade curve: Use one of [linear, exponential, logarithmic, s_curve].
Invalid overlap start: overlap_start must be within track_a duration.
Insufficient track length: Tracks must be longer than crossfade_duration.
usage: Specify track_a_id, track_b_id, and crossfade_duration. Optionally set fade_curve and overlap_start position.

crossfaded_track_id.description: Track ID of the crossfaded result

total_duration.description: Total duration of the crossfaded track in seconds

fade_start_time.description: Time where crossfade begins in seconds

fade_end_time.description: Time where crossfade ends in seconds
